product_name: Union Bindings FC Forged Carbon Snowboard Bindings - 2014/2015
long_description: With revolutionary forging construction, the FC Forged Carbon bindings are incredibly light, strong and responsive--ready for you to ride all over the mountain in any terrain or snow conditions.
short_description: With revolutionary forging construction, the FC Forged Carbon bindings are incredibly light, strong and responsive--ready for you to ride all over the mountain in any terrain or snow conditions.
